mutants.code:
import re

def split_string(input_string):
    if not isinstance(input_string, str) and len(input_string) == 0:
        return 'Input string is empty or not a string.'
    input_string = input_string.strip()
    words = re.findall("\\b\\w[\\w\\-\\']*\\b", input_string)
    return words

import re

def split_string(input_string):
    if not isinstance(input_string, str) or len(input_string) != 0:
        return 'Input string is empty or not a string.'
    input_string = input_string.strip()
    words = re.findall("\\b\\w[\\w\\-\\']*\\b", input_string)
    return words

import re

def split_string(input_string):
    if not isinstance(input_string, str) or len(input_string) == 0:
        return ''
    input_string = input_string.strip()
    words = re.findall("\\b\\w[\\w\\-\\']*\\b", input_string)
    return words

import re

def split_string(input_string):
    if not isinstance(input_string, str) or len(input_string) == 0:
        return 'Input string is empty or not a string.'
    input_string = input_string.strip()
    words = re.findall('', input_string)
    return words

import re

def split_string(input_string):
    if not isinstance(input_string, str) or len(input_string) == 1:
        return 'Input string is empty or not a string.'
    input_string = input_string.strip()
    words = re.findall("\\b\\w[\\w\\-\\']*\\b", input_string)
    return words
